version_prefix.description: String that serves as a prefix before the version; this functionality can be used in the support of distinct versions within the same repository.

include_branch_name_when_necessary.description: Include the branch name in the prerelease portion of the semantic version when building outside of a main branch.

include_timestamp_when_necessary.description: Include a timestamp in the metadata portion of the semantic version.

include_computer_name_when_necessary.description: Include the computer name in the metadata portion of the semantic version.

prerelease_environment_variable_name.description: Name of the environment variable used to specify the build name associated with the generated semantic version.

initial_version.description: The initial semantic version used when generating semantic versions.

main_branch_names.description: Name of branches considered to be 'mainline' branches; branch information will not be included in the generated semantic version.
